basics.name: Hannes Sachsenhofer
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a software engineer with 13+ years of experience using the .NET platform (C#), especially ASP.NET, and 17+ years of experience in web development in general.

work.summary: In addition to my existing responsibilities as Software Engineer I was the head of the Development and Operations team.
highlights: Kanban-style development process and team management.

work.summary: Design, implementation and operation of 'eRecruiter', a web-based recruiting and applicant management software.
highlights: I was hired as the first developer to morph an internally used Windows tool for recruiting into a cloud-based SaaS product. Over time, it grew into a successful software product that is in use internationally at many well-known public- and private-sector corporations.
I was responsible for the entire software development lifecycle, from the initial design and specification, to implementation and testing, to operations and monitoring.
Technologies used: ASP.NET (C#), SQL Server (LINQ to SQL, Entity Framework), JavaScript (jQuery), Windows Server, ...

work.summary: Function- and performance-testing of various Windows- and web-based software of the Silk product family (automatic as well as manual tests).
highlights: Technologies used: Silk Performer, Silk Test Manager, SQL Server, Oracle, ...

work.summary: Largely independent design and implementation of a new framework that served as foundation for various products, ie. CMS or e-mail marketing software.
highlights: Technologies used: ASP.NET (C#), SQL Server (ADO.NET), JavaScript, ...

education.area: Software Engineering for Business and Finance

volunteer.summary: Active involvement in various open source projects. Please see my GitHub profile for details.
highlights: ComicSyndicate: A RSS syndication service for web comics (http://comicsyndicate.org).
Erbsenzähler: A house-hold budgeting tool to track income and expenses (http://erbsenzaehler.azurewebsites.net).
WuzlStats: A tool to keep track of our company tabletop football score.
Participation in a few widely-used OSS libraries, ie. Trello.NET or mite.NET.

volunteer.summary: Regular speaker at the Technologieplauscherl user group in Linz, Austria.
Participation in the most important software engineering Q&A site.

skills.name: 13+ years experience using .NET 1.0 - .NET 4.5
keywords: ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC, ASP.NET Web API, ASP.NET Ajax

skills.name: 17+ years experience in web development
keywords: Common JavaScript frameworks, ie. jQuery, Bootstrap, Angular, SignalR, Modernizr, ...
